entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
